mapper.select: SELECT `id` ,`memberId` ,`serviceCategory1` ,`serviceCategory2Online` ,`serviceCategory2Offline` ,`productName` ,`numberOfApplicants` ,`salesMethod` ,`startDate` ,`endDate` ,`productDescriptions` ,`thumbnailImgPath` ,`productUrl` ,`sellPrice` ,`discountRate` ,`storeName` ,`storeAddress` ,`scriptFees` ,`corpsFile` ,`nowApplicants` ,`aprovalCondition` ,`cancelBySeller` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `sell_post` WHERE `serviceCategory1` = 'onlineProduct' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), `endDate`) >= 0 ORDER BY TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), `endDate`) LIMIT 8;

SELECT A.*, B.`status`, B.`createdAt` applicationCreatedAt
SELECT A.*
FROM `sell_post` AS A LEFT JOIN `application` AS B ON A.id = B.sellPostId
WHERE A.`serviceCategory1` = 'onlineProduct'
WHERE B.`memberId` = #{memberId}
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), A.`endDate`) >= 0 GROUP BY B.`sellPostId` ORDER BY count(B.`sellPostId`) DESC
LIMIT 8;

SELECT A.*, B.`createdAt` likeCreatedAt FROM `sell_post` AS A RIGHT JOIN `product_like` AS B ON A.id = B.sellPostId WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), `endDate`) >= 0 AND B.`memberId` = #{memberId} ORDER BY B.`createdAt` DESC;
